text: The Big Banana is a tourist attraction and amusement park in the city of Coffs Harbour, New South Wales, Australia. The Big Banana is in a banana plantation, and has a large walk-through banana model. It was opened on 22 December 1964. It was one of Australia's first big things. The site includes laser tag, mini golf, ice skating, a theatre for learning, a toboggan ride and a water park. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 establishments in Oceania Category:Buildings and structures in New South Wales Category:Theme parks Category:Bananas Category:1960s establishments in Australia
title: Big Banana
